structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.text: To the extent they are not superseded by KRS 381.224, 381.225, and 381.226, and except as provided in KRS 381.218, 381.219, 381.221, 381.222, and 381.223 shall apply only to inter vivos instruments and wills taking effect after July 1, 1960, and to appointments made after July 1, 1960, including appointments by inter vivos instrument or will under powers created before July 1, 1960.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 12, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 9, effective June 16, 1960.
